title: Taric rework
body:
This is just an idea to give him modernized abilities.I believe taric is a pretty good champ just reworking him for fun to be honest.

I believe his kit is a bit out of meta and can be put back into meta

Passive - taric enjoys bonus armour and magic resist and gives a fraction of this bonus to surrounding allies.


Q  -

Fires a target ability which stuns a target and amplifies damage to them 

w - 

Passive - After casting an ability taric's next basic attack roots the target and deals bonus magic damage based on his max health, as well as the enemies.

Active - increases an allies attack speed and the damage from their attacks. donates passive to target

E - 

Shields an ally for % of their max health. When the shield expires the ally heals the remaining damage left from the shield.

R - 

Shatters his hammer to deal magic damage and stunning all surrounding enemies in a radius.

replies.body: Gems? Gems are truly outrageous. They are truly, truly, truly outrageous.{{champion:44}}
and where in this kit is tarics op passive armor?
its in his w i think he loses it when he casts it

Way to much cc, not to mention that the new meta is the tank meta and taric would be pretty unfair to get such an advantage, He has his ranged stun, adding a stun and root to him is a bit much, it would be impossible to get away, stun, root, stun and what would the cool downs be, tarics initial purpose was to being in the middle of the fight utilizing his passive to get resets, stunning major targets and using his shatter to shred some of the enemies armour so the ad carry can do the deeps. You would have to be a lot more descriptive on how the mechanics of his skills would work, so people can get a better idea of what you meant. His E - "Shielding an ally" is this only for allies or can it be self-cast? Passive - "fraction of this bonus to surrounding allies" how large would the aura be, how much would this "fraction" be, would it be applied before or after some effects *masteries % armour bonus*. It's nice there's still people thinking about taric, i use to play him support all the time, sometimes top, running full armour runes with full defensive masteries (5% cdr from offensive), having 100 armour at level 1 is always fun. {{champion:44}} {{item:1029}}
ok nerf.. remove root from w just a little armour he already has that passive anyway but he loses it when poking
why not e just flat heal instead of left over shield turns to heal? It makes no difference {{summoner:7}}
mabey remove the heal, we need shield not heal.
I'd be ok with just having pink particles in his Armor of the Fifth Age skin and additional GEMS for the mastery emote.
